<p style="color:#E0E0E0;">A passionate <b>Frontend Developer</b> and B-Tech ECE student at <b>IIIT Sri City, Chittoor</b>, India. I'm driven by a desire to craft impactful web experiences and explore cutting-edge technology solutions. My expertise spans crafting responsive and intuitive web interfaces alongside building robust IoT systems. I thrive on combining technical precision with creative design to forge seamless, user-centric applications in the digital frontier.</p>

### <b style="color:#00FFCC;">Frontend & Web Development</b>
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Angular, Express, Node.js, D3.js

### <b style="color:#00FFCC;">Programming & Core Systems</b>
C, C++, Python, Java, Bash, Linux, Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Arduino, Unity

### <b style="color:#00FFCC;">Data & Cloud Architecture</b>
MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, AWS, Firebase

### <b style="color:#00FFCC;">DevOps & Specialized Tools</b>
Jenkins, Postman, MATLAB
